chips.title: Onchain Proof System
chips.subtitle: Onchain Proof
chips.description: A blockchain-based storage system that provides immutable ownership proof for every content

step1.title: Data Submission
step1.description: When users publish content, the system automatically generates on-chain proof for that data, recording publication timestamps and data summaries

step2.title: Blockchain Record
step2.description: The unique ID, timestamp, and data summary of the on-chain proof are long-term recorded on the blockchain, ensuring publication records cannot be tampered with

step3.title: Public Verification
step3.description: Anyone can view and verify on-chain proofs, ensuring transparency and integrity of published data

antiCounterfeit.title: Anti-Counterfeit Protection
antiCounterfeit.description: Blockchain technology ensures proofs cannot be forged or tampered with

uniqueId.title: Unique Identifier
uniqueId.description: Each proof has a unique ID for easy tracking and verification

transparency.title: Public Transparency
transparency.description: Everyone can view and verify the authenticity of proofs

permanentStorage.title: Long-term Storage
permanentStorage.description: Proof information is long-term stored and will not be lost or damaged

brand.description: A safe harbor for fandoms, protecting freedom of creativity and publishing rights for fanart creators.

footer.copyright: © 2025 o-kitchen. Built with ❤️ for the decentralized fanart networks.

what-is-chip.title: What is
what-is-chip.subtitle: Onchain Proof?
what-is-chip.description: On-chain proof is an original work certification system based on blockchain technology, which provides an unalterable proof of ownership for each original content.

whatIsChip.descriptionParagraph1: On-chain proof is a blockchain-based data certification system adopted by the o-kitchen platform. When a user publishes content, the system automatically generates an on-chain proof for that data.
whatIsChip.descriptionParagraph2: Each on-chain proof has a unique proof ID. This ID, along with key data such as the publication timestamp and a data summary, is permanently recorded on the blockchain, forming an immutable digital certificate.
whatIsChip.descriptionParagraph3: This ensures the integrity and traceability of the published data and provides a transparent and trustworthy data verification mechanism for the entire community.

core.title: Core Concept
core.description: “Let every publication be traceable, and every piece of data be protected”—On-chain proof is dedicated to building a trustworthy data certification system in a decentralized world.

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.description: Three simple steps to get blockchain certification for your published data.

step1.title: Data Submission
step1.description: When you publish content, the system automatically generates a unique on-chain proof for that data, recording the publication time and a data summary.

step2.title: Blockchain Record
step2.description: The system automatically generates a unique proof ID and records key information, such as the data summary, publisher information, and timestamp, on the blockchain.

step3.title: Get Certified
step3.description: Your data is certified on-chain, and anyone can use the proof ID to verify the integrity and authenticity of the published data.

benefits.title: Advantages of On-chain Proof
benefits.reasons: Why choose on-chain proof to certify your published data?

reason1.title: Anti-counterfeiting Protection
reason1.description: Blockchain technology ensures that the proof cannot be forged or tampered with.

reason2.title: Unique Identification
reason2.description: Each proof has a unique ID, making it easy to track and verify.

reason3.title: Open and Transparent
reason3.description: Anyone can view and verify the authenticity of the proof.

reason4.title: Permanent Storage
reason4.description: The proof information is permanently stored and will not be lost or corrupted.

whyOkitchen.title: Why o-kitchen?
whyOkitchen.description: We are committed to providing the best creation and social experience for the creator community.

reason1.title: Community-Driven
reason1.subtitle: Governed and developed by the creator community.
reason1.description: o-kitchen will be a platform completely driven by the creator community in the future. All important decisions will be made with the participation of community members, ensuring that the platform always serves the real needs of creators.

reason2.title: Open Source & Transparent
reason2.subtitle: Built on an open-source blockchain protocol.
reason2.description: Our technology stack is completely open-source, and anyone can review the code and suggest improvements. The transparent technical architecture ensures the trustworthiness and security of the platform.

reason3.title: Non-Profit Nature
reason3.subtitle: Focuses on serving creators and is not for profit.
reason3.description: As a non-profit platform, our only goal is to provide better services for creators. All income will be used for platform maintenance and development, and user experience will never be sacrificed for commercial interests.

reason4.title: Technically Advanced
reason4.subtitle: Adopts the latest Web3 technology stack.
reason4.description: Built on advanced Web3 technologies like Lens Protocol and Grove Storage, it ensures the platform has optimal performance, security, and user experience.

callToAction.title: Start Your Journey with o-kitchen
callToAction.subtitle: Certify your publishing data and join the decentralized creation community
callToAction.description: Let every creation sail freely in this sea 🚢✨
